name: Grey Matters
description:
The Inclusivity Game Jam ran through 25-27th June 2021 and tasked participants with designing and developing a game around the theme of 'Find it, fix it' within the given time.

Gray Matters is a puzzle game that has you navigate the most unknown to us organ of all - the brain!

Backtrace Link: https://share.backtrace.io/api/share/tnx2x3mCVPvhvudPJ8UYVMd2
